mapper.select: select count(*) from likebook where like_id=(select user_no from member where user_no=#{like_id}) and like_bookno=(select ebook_no from bookinfo where ebook_no=#{like_bookno})
mapper.insert: insert into likebook values ((select nvl(max(likeno),0)+1 from likebook),#{like_id},#{like_bookno})
mapper.delete: delete from likebook where like_id=#{like_id} and like_bookno=#{like_bookno}
